name: The Weapons of Asgard
description: This book is about creating replicas of the weapons used by the Norse Gods, such as the well-known Mj√∂lnir.  It is well illustrated with lots of pictures.

name: The Weapons of Asgard and Beyond
name_plural: The Weapons of Asgard and Beyond
description: An ornate book which appears to be written in Norse runes. Based on the detailed illustrations, it appears to contain information about crafting numerous weapons used by various Gods.
